testcase.name: Verify Slot Edit Functionality

failure.message: The new mall name is not valid. expected [sep5-- Austin Town, Bengaluru 12:00 PM 12:00 PM] but found [sep5-- Austin Town, Bengaluru 12:00 PM 10:00 PM]
